attributes.action: Remove all parliamentary powers from Parliament.
attributes.background: Our current parliament has made it quiet clear that they have no intension of listening to or representing the people of the UK. As such they are in violation of the agreement allowing them to utilise the power vested in them. We demand they are remove totally and completely from office..

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action. We are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken. If you would like a general election to take place you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221912
